Hidden Danger.name: Hidden Danger
Hidden Danger.flavor: You attack with nothing more than a whisper, cutting through your enemy and its defenses in one deadly attack.
Hidden Danger.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Hidden Danger.attack: Wisdom vs. AC; if you are hidden when you attack, you remain hidden after the attack.

Just Punishment.name: Just Punishment
Just Punishment.flavor: You strike your foe in such a way that if it strikes back, its wounds worsen, and if it does nothing, it invites disaster.
Just Punishment.trigger: You are damaged by an attack
Just Punishment.effect: You make an avenger at-will weapon attack or melee basic attack. On a hit, that attack deals 2[W] extra damage and you can teleport 3 squares. If the attack misses, this power is not expended.

Clarity of Purpose.name: Clarity of Purpose
Clarity of Purpose.flavor: By suffering your enemyâ€™s attack, you gain a renewed sense of purpose and a clear vision of how this foe can be stopped.
Clarity of Purpose.trigger: You are damaged by an attack
Clarity of Purpose.effect: You take a move or a minor action. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the triggering attacker hits an ally, you gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll against it.
